nrqlQueries.query: FROM Login SELECT count(*) as 'Event Count' FACET ORGANIZATION_ID SINCE 1 day ago limit 20

FROM ApexCallout, ApexExecution, ApexRestApi, ApexSoap, ApexTrigger, ApexUnexpectedException, API, ApiTotalUsage, AsynchronousReportRun, AuraRequest, BulkApi, BulkApi2, ChangeSetOperation, ConcurrentLongRunningApexLimit, Console, ContentDistribution, ContentDocumentLink, ContentTransfer, ContinuationCalloutSummary, CVR, Dashboard, DocumentAttachmentDownoads, ExternalCrossOrgCallout, ExternalCustomApexCallout, ExternalODataCallout, FlowExecution, InsecureExternalAssets, KnowledgeArticleView, LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPageView, LightningPerformance, Login, LoginAs, Logout, MetadataApiOperation, MultiblockReport, NamedCredential, OneCommerceUsage, PackageInstall, PlatformEncryption, QueuedExecution, Report, ReportExport, RestApi, Sandbox, Search, SearchClick, Sites, TimeBasedWorkflow, TransactionSecurity, URI, VisualforceRequest, WaveChange, WaveDownload, WaveInteraction, WavePerformance SELECT count(*) FACET EVENT_TYPE SINCE 1 day ago limit 100
FROM Login SELECT uniqueCount(USER_ID) as Users FACET USER_NAME SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES COMPARE WITH 1 day ago limit 12

FROM Report, ReportExport, Login SELECT uniqueCount(REQUEST_ID) as Report WHERE USER_NAME > '' FACET USER_ID, USER_NAME, LOGIN_KEY, SESSION_KEY, URI SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES LIMIT 15

# ![New Relic logo](https://newrelic.com/static-assets/images/icons/avatar-newrelic.png)  Who & where users login from
___
___

nrqlQueries.query: FROM ApexCallout, ApexExecution, ApexRestApi, ApexSoap, ApexTrigger, ApexUnexpectedException, API, ApiTotalUsage, AsynchronousReportRun, AuraRequest, BulkApi, BulkApi2, ChangeSetOperation, ConcurrentLongRunningApexLimit, Console, ContentDistribution, ContentDocumentLink, ContentTransfer, ContinuationCalloutSummary, CVR, Dashboard, DocumentAttachmentDownoads, ExternalCrossOrgCallout, ExternalCustomApexCallout, ExternalODataCallout, FlowExecution, InsecureExternalAssets, KnowledgeArticleView, LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPageView, LightningPerformance, Login, LoginAs, Logout, MetadataApiOperation, MultiblockReport, NamedCredential, OneCommerceUsage, PackageInstall, PlatformEncryption, QueuedExecution, Report, ReportExport, RestApi, Sandbox, Search, SearchClick, Sites, TimeBasedWorkflow, TransactionSecurity, URI, VisualforceRequest, WaveChange, WaveDownload, WaveInteraction, WavePerformance SELECT uniqueCount(LOGIN_KEY) as 'times logged in' FACET USER_ID since 1 day ago limit 200

FROM ApexCallout, ApexExecution, ApexRestApi, ApexSoap, ApexTrigger, ApexUnexpectedException, API, ApiTotalUsage, AsynchronousReportRun, AuraRequest, BulkApi, BulkApi2, ChangeSetOperation, ConcurrentLongRunningApexLimit, Console, ContentDistribution, ContentDocumentLink, ContentTransfer, ContinuationCalloutSummary, CVR, Dashboard, DocumentAttachmentDownoads, ExternalCrossOrgCallout, ExternalCustomApexCallout, ExternalODataCallout, FlowExecution, InsecureExternalAssets, KnowledgeArticleView, LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPageView, LightningPerformance, Login, LoginAs, Logout, MetadataApiOperation, MultiblockReport, NamedCredential, OneCommerceUsage, PackageInstall, PlatformEncryption, QueuedExecution, Report, ReportExport, RestApi, Sandbox, Search, SearchClick, Sites, TimeBasedWorkflow, TransactionSecurity, URI, VisualforceRequest, WaveChange, WaveDownload, WaveInteraction, WavePerformance SELECT uniqueCount(LOGIN_KEY) FACET CLIENT_IP since 1 day ago limit 200

FROM ApexCallout, ApexExecution, ApexRestApi, ApexSoap, ApexTrigger, ApexUnexpectedException, API, ApiTotalUsage, AsynchronousReportRun, AuraRequest, BulkApi, BulkApi2, ChangeSetOperation, ConcurrentLongRunningApexLimit, Console, ContentDistribution, ContentDocumentLink, ContentTransfer, ContinuationCalloutSummary, CVR, Dashboard, DocumentAttachmentDownoads, ExternalCrossOrgCallout, ExternalCustomApexCallout, ExternalODataCallout, FlowExecution, InsecureExternalAssets, KnowledgeArticleView, LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPageView, LightningPerformance, Login, LoginAs, Logout, MetadataApiOperation, MultiblockReport, NamedCredential, OneCommerceUsage, PackageInstall, PlatformEncryption, QueuedExecution, Report, ReportExport, RestApi, Sandbox, Search, SearchClick, Sites, TimeBasedWorkflow, TransactionSecurity, URI, VisualforceRequest, WaveChange, WaveDownload, WaveInteraction, WavePerformance SELECT uniqueCount(LOGIN_KEY) FACET USER_ID since 1 day ago TIMESERIES  limit 15 COMPARE WITH 1 day ago

widgets.title: Where are users logging in from

nrqlQueries.query: FROM ApexCallout, ApexExecution, ApexRestApi, ApexSoap, ApexTrigger, ApexUnexpectedException, API, ApiTotalUsage, AsynchronousReportRun, AuraRequest, BulkApi, BulkApi2, ChangeSetOperation, ConcurrentLongRunningApexLimit, Console, ContentDistribution, ContentDocumentLink, ContentTransfer, ContinuationCalloutSummary, CVR, Dashboard, DocumentAttachmentDownoads, ExternalCrossOrgCallout, ExternalCustomApexCallout, ExternalODataCallout, FlowExecution, InsecureExternalAssets, KnowledgeArticleView, LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPageView, LightningPerformance, Login, LoginAs, Logout, MetadataApiOperation, MultiblockReport, NamedCredential, OneCommerceUsage, PackageInstall, PlatformEncryption, QueuedExecution, Report, ReportExport, RestApi, Sandbox, Search, SearchClick, Sites, TimeBasedWorkflow, TransactionSecurity, URI, VisualforceRequest, WaveChange, WaveDownload, WaveInteraction, WavePerformance SELECT uniqueCount(LOGIN_KEY) FACET CLIENT_IP since 1 day ago TIMESERIES  limit 15 COMPARE WITH 1 day ago

FROM LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPerformance SELECT uniqueCount(REQUEST_ID, UI_EVENT_SOURCE) as 'Action Count' WHERE UI_EVENT_SOURCE IN ('SecurityError', 'create', 'delete', 'update', 'InvalidStateError') AND UI_EVENT_TYPE = 'crud' FACET USER_ID limit 200

FROM LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPerformance SELECT uniqueCount(REQUEST_ID, UI_EVENT_SOURCE) WHERE UI_EVENT_SOURCE IN ('SecurityError', 'create', 'delete', 'update', 'InvalidStateError') AND UI_EVENT_TYPE in ('crud') FACET UI_EVENT_SOURCE since 1 day ago limit 20

FROM LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPerformance SELECT uniqueCount(USER_ID, UI_EVENT_SOURCE) WHERE UI_EVENT_SOURCE IN ('SecurityError', 'create', 'delete', 'update', 'InvalidStateError') AND UI_EVENT_TYPE in ('crud') FACET USER_ID, UI_EVENT_SOURCE since 1 day ago limit 30 TIMESERIES
FROM ApexTrigger SELECT count(*) FACET ENTITY_NAME since 1 day ago

FROM ApexTrigger SELECT count(*) where TRIGGER_TYPE like 'Before%' FACET cases (where TRIGGER_TYPE like '%Update' as Updates, where TRIGGER_TYPE like '%Insert' as Inserts, where TRIGGER_TYPE like '%Delete' as Deletes) since 1 day ago limit 100
FROM ApexTrigger SELECT count(*) FACET ENTITY_NAME, TRIGGER_TYPE since 1 day ago limit 30 TIMESERIES
FROM PlatformEncryption SELECT uniqueCount(USER_ID) FACET ACTION since 1 day ago
FROM PlatformEncryption SELECT count(*)  FACET ACTION, KEY_TYPE, METHOD since 1 day ago TIMESERIES COMPARE WITH 1 day ago
FROM LoginAs SELECT uniqueCount(USER_ID, SESSION_KEY) FACET DELEGATED_USER_ID since 1 day ago limit 30
FROM LoginAs SELECT uniqueCount(USER_ID) as 'Impersonated Users' since 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago
FROM LoginAs SELECT uniqueCount(DELEGATED_USER_ID, SESSION_KEY) as 'Impersonated Sessions' since 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago
FROM LoginAs SELECT count(*) FACET USER_ID, SESSION_KEY since 1 day ago TIMESERIES limit 15 COMPARE WITH 1 day ago

pages.name: Who viewed what reports and when

rawConfiguration.text:
---
# ![New Relic logo](https://newrelic.com/static-assets/images/icons/avatar-newrelic.png) Who viewed what reports and when 
---

nrqlQueries.query: FROM Report SELECT uniqueCount(REQUEST_ID) as 'Viewed Reports' WHERE ORIGIN != 'ReportExported' SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago
FROM Report SELECT uniqueCount(REQUEST_ID) as 'Exported Reports' WHERE ORIGIN = 'ReportExported' SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago
FROM Report SELECT uniqueCount(REQUEST_ID) as 'Report Count' FACET USER_ID since 1 day ago limit 40
FROM Report SELECT uniqueCount(REQUEST_ID) WHERE LOGIN_KEY > '' FACET LOGIN_KEY SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 40
FROM Report SELECT count(*) FACET REQUEST_ID SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 40
FROM Report, ReportExport SELECT uniqueCount(REQUEST_ID) FACET CLIENT_IP SINCE 1 week ago LIMIT 20
FROM Report SELECT uniqueCount(USER_ID) as 'Users Running Reports' WHERE ORIGIN != 'ReportExported' since 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago
FROM Report SELECT uniqueCount(USER_ID) as 'Users Exporting Reports' WHERE ORIGIN = 'ReportExported' since 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago
FROM Report  SELECT uniqueCount(REQUEST_ID) facet cases(WHERE ORIGIN = 'ReportExported' as 'Exported Reports', WHERE ORIGIN != 'ReportExported' as 'Viewed Reports') SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 30
FROM Report, Login SELECT uniqueCount(REQUEST_ID) as Report FACET USER_NAME, LOGIN_KEY, SESSION_KEY, URI TIMESERIES LIMIT 15 SINCE 1 day ago

FROM Report SELECT uniqueCount(REQUEST_ID) as '#reports', min(ROW_COUNT), average(ROW_COUNT), max(ROW_COUNT), latest(ORIGIN), min(AVERAGE_ROW_SIZE) as 'min row size', average(AVERAGE_ROW_SIZE) as 'avg row size', max(AVERAGE_ROW_SIZE) as 'max row size', sum(ROW_COUNT*AVERAGE_ROW_SIZE) as 'Total Report Size' WHERE ROW_COUNT > 500 FACET USER_ID ORDER BY average(ROW_COUNT) since 1 day ago limit 100
FROM Report SELECT histogram(ROW_COUNT, 1500, 10)  FACET REPORT_ID limit 15
FROM Report SELECT * limit 500

---

nrqlQueries.query: FROM ApexCallout, ApexExecution, ApexRestApi, ApexSoap, ApexTrigger, ApexUnexpectedException, API, ApiTotalUsage, AsynchronousReportRun, AuraRequest, BulkApi, BulkApi2, ChangeSetOperation, ConcurrentLongRunningApexLimit, Console, ContentDistribution, ContentDocumentLink, ContentTransfer, ContinuationCalloutSummary, CVR, Dashboard, DocumentAttachmentDownoads, ExternalCrossOrgCallout, ExternalCustomApexCallout, ExternalODataCallout, FlowExecution, InsecureExternalAssets, KnowledgeArticleView, LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPageView, LightningPerformance, Login, LoginAs, Logout, MetadataApiOperation, MultiblockReport, NamedCredential, OneCommerceUsage, PackageInstall, PlatformEncryption, QueuedExecution, Report, ReportExport, RestApi, Sandbox, Search, SearchClick, Sites, TimeBasedWorkflow, TransactionSecurity, URI, VisualforceRequest, WaveChange, WaveDownload, WaveInteraction, WavePerformance SELECT uniqueCount(USER_ID) as Users WHERE LOGIN_KEY > '' COMPARE WITH 1 day ago

FROM ApexCallout, ApexExecution, ApexRestApi, ApexSoap, ApexTrigger, ApexUnexpectedException, API, ApiTotalUsage, AsynchronousReportRun, AuraRequest, BulkApi, BulkApi2, ChangeSetOperation, ConcurrentLongRunningApexLimit, Console, ContentDistribution, ContentDocumentLink, ContentTransfer, ContinuationCalloutSummary, CVR, Dashboard, DocumentAttachmentDownoads, ExternalCrossOrgCallout, ExternalCustomApexCallout, ExternalODataCallout, FlowExecution, InsecureExternalAssets, KnowledgeArticleView, LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPageView, LightningPerformance, Login, LoginAs, Logout, MetadataApiOperation, MultiblockReport, NamedCredential, OneCommerceUsage, PackageInstall, PlatformEncryption, QueuedExecution, Report, ReportExport, RestApi, Sandbox, Search, SearchClick, Sites, TimeBasedWorkflow, TransactionSecurity, URI, VisualforceRequest, WaveChange, WaveDownload, WaveInteraction, WavePerformance SELECT uniqueCount(LOGIN_KEY) WHERE LOGIN_KEY > '' FACET USER_ID limit 200

FROM ApexCallout, ApexExecution, ApexRestApi, ApexSoap, ApexTrigger, ApexUnexpectedException, API, ApiTotalUsage, AsynchronousReportRun, AuraRequest, BulkApi, BulkApi2, ChangeSetOperation, ConcurrentLongRunningApexLimit, Console, ContentDistribution, ContentDocumentLink, ContentTransfer, ContinuationCalloutSummary, CVR, Dashboard, DocumentAttachmentDownoads, ExternalCrossOrgCallout, ExternalCustomApexCallout, ExternalODataCallout, FlowExecution, InsecureExternalAssets, KnowledgeArticleView, LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPageView, LightningPerformance, Login, LoginAs, Logout, MetadataApiOperation, MultiblockReport, NamedCredential, OneCommerceUsage, PackageInstall, PlatformEncryption, QueuedExecution, Report, ReportExport, RestApi, Sandbox, Search, SearchClick, Sites, TimeBasedWorkflow, TransactionSecurity, URI, VisualforceRequest, WaveChange, WaveDownload, WaveInteraction, WavePerformance SELECT uniqueCount(SESSION_KEY) WHERE LOGIN_KEY > '' FACET LOGIN_KEY limit 200

nrqlQueries.query: FROM ApexCallout, ApexExecution, ApexRestApi, ApexSoap, ApexTrigger, ApexUnexpectedException, API, ApiTotalUsage, AsynchronousReportRun, AuraRequest, BulkApi, BulkApi2, ChangeSetOperation, ConcurrentLongRunningApexLimit, Console, ContentDistribution, ContentDocumentLink, ContentTransfer, ContinuationCalloutSummary, CVR, Dashboard, DocumentAttachmentDownoads, ExternalCrossOrgCallout, ExternalCustomApexCallout, ExternalODataCallout, FlowExecution, InsecureExternalAssets, KnowledgeArticleView, LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPageView, LightningPerformance, Login, LoginAs, Logout, MetadataApiOperation, MultiblockReport, NamedCredential, OneCommerceUsage, PackageInstall, PlatformEncryption, QueuedExecution, Report, ReportExport, RestApi, Sandbox, Search, SearchClick, Sites, TimeBasedWorkflow, TransactionSecurity, URI, VisualforceRequest, WaveChange, WaveDownload, WaveInteraction, WavePerformance SELECT uniqueCount(LOGIN_KEY) where LOGIN_KEY > '' FACET CLIENT_IP limit 200

FROM ApexCallout, ApexExecution, ApexRestApi, ApexSoap, ApexTrigger, ApexUnexpectedException, API, ApiTotalUsage, AsynchronousReportRun, AuraRequest, BulkApi, BulkApi2, ChangeSetOperation, ConcurrentLongRunningApexLimit, Console, ContentDistribution, ContentDocumentLink, ContentTransfer, ContinuationCalloutSummary, CVR, Dashboard, DocumentAttachmentDownoads, ExternalCrossOrgCallout, ExternalCustomApexCallout, ExternalODataCallout, FlowExecution, InsecureExternalAssets, KnowledgeArticleView, LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPageView, LightningPerformance, Login, LoginAs, Logout, MetadataApiOperation, MultiblockReport, NamedCredential, OneCommerceUsage, PackageInstall, PlatformEncryption, QueuedExecution, Report, ReportExport, RestApi, Sandbox, Search, SearchClick, Sites, TimeBasedWorkflow, TransactionSecurity, URI, VisualforceRequest, WaveChange, WaveDownload, WaveInteraction, WavePerformance SELECT uniqueCount(REQUEST_ID) WHERE SESSION_KEY > '' FACET SESSION_KEY limit 200

FROM ApexCallout, ApexExecution, ApexRestApi, ApexSoap, ApexTrigger, ApexUnexpectedException, API, ApiTotalUsage, AsynchronousReportRun, AuraRequest, BulkApi, BulkApi2, ChangeSetOperation, ConcurrentLongRunningApexLimit, Console, ContentDistribution, ContentDocumentLink, ContentTransfer, ContinuationCalloutSummary, CVR, Dashboard, DocumentAttachmentDownoads, ExternalCrossOrgCallout, ExternalCustomApexCallout, ExternalODataCallout, FlowExecution, InsecureExternalAssets, KnowledgeArticleView, LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPageView, LightningPerformance, Login, LoginAs, Logout, MetadataApiOperation, MultiblockReport, NamedCredential, OneCommerceUsage, PackageInstall, PlatformEncryption, QueuedExecution, Report, ReportExport, RestApi, Sandbox, Search, SearchClick, Sites, TimeBasedWorkflow, TransactionSecurity, URI, VisualforceRequest, WaveChange, WaveDownload, WaveInteraction, WavePerformance SELECT count(*) FACET EVENT_TYPE limit 100

FROM ApexCallout, ApexExecution, ApexRestApi, ApexSoap, ApexTrigger, ApexUnexpectedException, API, ApiTotalUsage, AsynchronousReportRun, AuraRequest, BulkApi, BulkApi2, ChangeSetOperation, ConcurrentLongRunningApexLimit, Console, ContentDistribution, ContentDocumentLink, ContentTransfer, ContinuationCalloutSummary, CVR, Dashboard, DocumentAttachmentDownoads, ExternalCrossOrgCallout, ExternalCustomApexCallout, ExternalODataCallout, FlowExecution, InsecureExternalAssets, KnowledgeArticleView, LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPageView, LightningPerformance, Login, LoginAs, Logout, MetadataApiOperation, MultiblockReport, NamedCredential, OneCommerceUsage, PackageInstall, PlatformEncryption, QueuedExecution, Report, ReportExport, RestApi, Sandbox, Search, SearchClick, Sites, TimeBasedWorkflow, TransactionSecurity, URI, VisualforceRequest, WaveChange, WaveDownload, WaveInteraction, WavePerformance SELECT uniqueCount(CLIENT_IP) as Locations WHERE CLIENT_IP > '' limit 100 COMPARE WITH 1 day ago

FROM ApexCallout, ApexExecution, ApexRestApi, ApexSoap, ApexTrigger, ApexUnexpectedException, API, ApiTotalUsage, AsynchronousReportRun, AuraRequest, BulkApi, BulkApi2, ChangeSetOperation, ConcurrentLongRunningApexLimit, Console, ContentDistribution, ContentDocumentLink, ContentTransfer, ContinuationCalloutSummary, CVR, Dashboard, DocumentAttachmentDownoads, ExternalCrossOrgCallout, ExternalCustomApexCallout, ExternalODataCallout, FlowExecution, InsecureExternalAssets, KnowledgeArticleView, LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPageView, LightningPerformance, Login, LoginAs, Logout, MetadataApiOperation, MultiblockReport, NamedCredential, OneCommerceUsage, PackageInstall, PlatformEncryption, QueuedExecution, Report, ReportExport, RestApi, Sandbox, Search, SearchClick, Sites, TimeBasedWorkflow, TransactionSecurity, URI, VisualforceRequest, WaveChange, WaveDownload, WaveInteraction, WavePerformance SELECT uniqueCount(LOGIN_KEY) FACET USER_ID since 1 day ago TIMESERIES  limit 15 COMPARE WITH 1 day ago

widgets.title: Where are users logging in from

nrqlQueries.query: FROM ApexCallout, ApexExecution, ApexRestApi, ApexSoap, ApexTrigger, ApexUnexpectedException, API, ApiTotalUsage, AsynchronousReportRun, AuraRequest, BulkApi, BulkApi2, ChangeSetOperation, ConcurrentLongRunningApexLimit, Console, ContentDistribution, ContentDocumentLink, ContentTransfer, ContinuationCalloutSummary, CVR, Dashboard, DocumentAttachmentDownoads, ExternalCrossOrgCallout, ExternalCustomApexCallout, ExternalODataCallout, FlowExecution, InsecureExternalAssets, KnowledgeArticleView, LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPageView, LightningPerformance, Login, LoginAs, Logout, MetadataApiOperation, MultiblockReport, NamedCredential, OneCommerceUsage, PackageInstall, PlatformEncryption, QueuedExecution, Report, ReportExport, RestApi, Sandbox, Search, SearchClick, Sites, TimeBasedWorkflow, TransactionSecurity, URI, VisualforceRequest, WaveChange, WaveDownload, WaveInteraction, WavePerformance SELECT uniqueCount(LOGIN_KEY) FACET CLIENT_IP since 1 day ago TIMESERIES  limit 15 COMPARE WITH 1 day ago

FROM ApexCallout, ApexExecution, ApexRestApi, ApexSoap, ApexTrigger, ApexUnexpectedException, API, ApiTotalUsage, AsynchronousReportRun, AuraRequest, BulkApi, BulkApi2, ChangeSetOperation, ConcurrentLongRunningApexLimit, Console, ContentDistribution, ContentDocumentLink, ContentTransfer, ContinuationCalloutSummary, CVR, Dashboard, DocumentAttachmentDownoads, ExternalCrossOrgCallout, ExternalCustomApexCallout, ExternalODataCallout, FlowExecution, InsecureExternalAssets, KnowledgeArticleView, LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPageView, LightningPerformance, Login, LoginAs, Logout, MetadataApiOperation, MultiblockReport, NamedCredential, OneCommerceUsage, PackageInstall, PlatformEncryption, QueuedExecution, Report, ReportExport, RestApi, Sandbox, Search, SearchClick, Sites, TimeBasedWorkflow, TransactionSecurity, URI, VisualforceRequest, WaveChange, WaveDownload, WaveInteraction, WavePerformance SELECT *

FROM ApexCallout, ApexExecution, ApexRestApi, ApexSoap, ApexTrigger, ApexUnexpectedException, API, ApiTotalUsage, AsynchronousReportRun, AuraRequest, BulkApi, BulkApi2, ChangeSetOperation, ConcurrentLongRunningApexLimit, Console, ContentDistribution, ContentDocumentLink, ContentTransfer, ContinuationCalloutSummary, CVR, Dashboard, DocumentAttachmentDownoads, ExternalCrossOrgCallout, ExternalCustomApexCallout, ExternalODataCallout, FlowExecution, InsecureExternalAssets, KnowledgeArticleView, LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPageView, LightningPerformance, Login, LoginAs, Logout, MetadataApiOperation, MultiblockReport, NamedCredential, OneCommerceUsage, PackageInstall, PlatformEncryption, QueuedExecution, Report, ReportExport, RestApi, Sandbox, Search, SearchClick, Sites, TimeBasedWorkflow, TransactionSecurity, URI, VisualforceRequest, WaveChange, WaveDownload, WaveInteraction, WavePerformance SELECT uniqueCount(LOGIN_KEY) FACET USER_ID, CLIENT_IP since 1 day ago TIMESERIES  limit 15

FROM LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPerformance SELECT uniqueCount(REQUEST_ID, UI_EVENT_SOURCE) as 'Action Count' WHERE UI_EVENT_SOURCE = 'update' AND UI_EVENT_TYPE = 'crud' FACET UI_EVENT_SOURCE compare with 1 day ago

FROM LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPerformance SELECT uniqueCount(REQUEST_ID, UI_EVENT_SOURCE) as 'Action Count' WHERE UI_EVENT_SOURCE = 'create' AND UI_EVENT_TYPE = 'crud' FACET UI_EVENT_SOURCE compare with 1 day ago

FROM LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPerformance SELECT uniqueCount(REQUEST_ID, UI_EVENT_SOURCE) as 'Action Count' WHERE UI_EVENT_SOURCE ='delete' AND UI_EVENT_TYPE = 'crud' FACET UI_EVENT_SOURCE compare with 1 day ago

FROM LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPerformance SELECT uniqueCount(REQUEST_ID, UI_EVENT_SOURCE) as 'Action Count' WHERE UI_EVENT_SOURCE IN ('SecurityError', 'create', 'delete', 'update', 'InvalidStateError') AND UI_EVENT_TYPE = 'crud' FACET UI_EVENT_SOURCE

FROM LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPerformance SELECT uniqueCount(REQUEST_ID, UI_EVENT_SOURCE) as 'Action Count' WHERE UI_EVENT_SOURCE IN ('SecurityError', 'create', 'delete', 'update', 'InvalidStateError') AND UI_EVENT_TYPE = 'crud' FACET USER_ID limit 200

FROM LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPerformance SELECT uniqueCount(REQUEST_ID, UI_EVENT_SOURCE) as 'Action Count' WHERE UI_EVENT_SOURCE IN ('SecurityError', 'create', 'delete', 'update', 'InvalidStateError') AND UI_EVENT_TYPE in ('crud') FACET LOGIN_KEY limit 200

FROM LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPerformance SELECT uniqueCount(REQUEST_ID, UI_EVENT_SOURCE) as 'event source' WHERE UI_EVENT_SOURCE IN ('SecurityError', 'create', 'delete', 'update', 'InvalidStateError') AND UI_EVENT_TYPE = 'crud' FACET SESSION_KEY SINCE 1 month ago limit 200

FROM LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPerformance SELECT count(*) as 'events' WHERE UI_EVENT_SOURCE IN ('SecurityError', 'create', 'delete', 'update', 'InvalidStateError') AND UI_EVENT_TYPE = 'crud' FACET REQUEST_ID SINCE 1 month ago limit 200

FROM LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPerformance SELECT uniqueCount(SESSION_KEY, UI_EVENT_SOURCE) as 'Action Count' WHERE UI_EVENT_SOURCE IN ('SecurityError', 'create', 'delete', 'update', 'InvalidStateError') AND UI_EVENT_TYPE = 'crud'    FACET CLIENT_IP limit 200

FROM LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPerformance SELECT uniqueCount(REQUEST_ID, UI_EVENT_SOURCE) WHERE UI_EVENT_SOURCE IN ('SecurityError', 'create', 'delete', 'update', 'InvalidStateError') AND UI_EVENT_TYPE in ('crud') FACET USER_ID, UI_EVENT_SOURCE compare with 1 day ago TIMESERIES
FROM LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPerformance SELECT * WHERE UI_EVENT_SOURCE IN ('SecurityError', 'create', 'delete', 'update') AND UI_EVENT_TYPE in ('crud')
FROM ApexTrigger SELECT count(*) FACET USER_ID since 1 day ago limit 100
FROM ApexTrigger SELECT count(*) FACET USER_ID since 1 day ago limit 30 TIMESERIES
FROM ApexTrigger SELECT count(*) FACET ENTITY_NAME since 1 day ago limit 100
FROM ApexTrigger SELECT count(*) FACET ENTITY_NAME since 1 day ago limit 30 TIMESERIES
FROM ApexTrigger SELECT count(*) FACET TRIGGER_NAME since 1 day ago limit 100
FROM ApexTrigger SELECT count(*) FACET TRIGGER_NAME since 1 day ago limit 30 TIMESERIES

FROM ApexTrigger SELECT count(*) where TRIGGER_TYPE like 'Before%' FACET cases (where TRIGGER_TYPE like '%Update' as Updates, where TRIGGER_TYPE like '%Insert' as Inserts, where TRIGGER_TYPE like '%Delete' as Deletes) since 1 day ago limit 100
FROM ApexTrigger SELECT count(*) FACET TRIGGER_TYPE since 1 day ago limit 30 TIMESERIES
FROM ApexTrigger select USER_ID, CLIENT_IP, ENTITY_NAME, REQUEST_ID, TRIGGER_ID, TRIGGER_NAME, TRIGGER_TYPE, timestamp  since 1 day ago  limit max
FROM PlatformEncryption SELECT uniqueCount(REQUEST_ID)  FACET ACTION
FROM PlatformEncryption SELECT uniqueCount(REQUEST_ID) FACET KEY_TYPE
FROM PlatformEncryption SELECT uniqueCount(REQUEST_ID) WHERE METHOD > '' FACET METHOD
FROM PlatformEncryption SELECT uniqueCount(REQUEST_ID) FACET LOGIN_KEY
FROM PlatformEncryption SELECT uniqueCount(REQUEST_ID) FACET ACTION, KEY_TYPE, METHOD TIMESERIES COMPARE WITH 1 day ago
FROM PlatformEncryption SELECT * limit 500
FROM LoginAs SELECT uniqueCount(USER_ID) as 'Impersonated Users' compare with 1 day ago
FROM LoginAs SELECT uniqueCount(DELEGATED_USER_ID, SESSION_KEY) as 'Impersonated Sessions' compare with 1 day ago
FROM LoginAs SELECT uniqueCount(USER_ID, SESSION_KEY) FACET DELEGATED_USER_ID limit 30
FROM LoginAs SELECT uniqueCount(USER_ID, SESSION_KEY) as 'number of impersonation requests' FACET USER_ID limit 100

FROM ApexCallout, ApexExecution, ApexRestApi, ApexSoap, ApexTrigger, ApexUnexpectedException, API, ApiTotalUsage, AsynchronousReportRun, AuraRequest, BulkApi, BulkApi2, ChangeSetOperation, ConcurrentLongRunningApexLimit, Console, ContentDistribution, ContentDocumentLink, ContentTransfer, ContinuationCalloutSummary, CVR, Dashboard, DocumentAttachmentDownoads, ExternalCrossOrgCallout, ExternalCustomApexCallout, ExternalODataCallout, FlowExecution, InsecureExternalAssets, KnowledgeArticleView, LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPageView, LightningPerformance, Login, LoginAs, Logout, MetadataApiOperation, MultiblockReport, NamedCredential, OneCommerceUsage, PackageInstall, PlatformEncryption, QueuedExecution, Report, ReportExport, RestApi, Sandbox, Search, SearchClick, Sites, TimeBasedWorkflow, TransactionSecurity, URI, VisualforceRequest, WaveChange, WaveDownload, WaveInteraction  SELECT count(*) facet EVENT_TYPE limit 100
FROM LoginAs SELECT count(*) FACET USER_ID, SESSION_KEY TIMESERIES limit 15 COMPARE WITH 1 day ago

FROM ApexCallout, ApexExecution, ApexRestApi, ApexSoap, ApexTrigger, ApexUnexpectedException, 
API, ApiTotalUsage, AsynchronousReportRun, AuraRequest, BulkApi, BulkApi2, ChangeSetOperation, 
ConcurrentLongRunningApexLimit, Console, ContentDistribution, ContentDocumentLink, ContentTransfer, 
ContinuationCalloutSummary, CVR, Dashboard, DocumentAttachmentDownoads, ExternalCrossOrgCallout, 
ExternalCustomApexCallout, ExternalODataCallout, FlowExecution, InsecureExternalAssets, 
KnowledgeArticleView, LightningError, LightningInteraction, LightningPageView, LightningPerformance, 
Login, LoginAs, Logout, MetadataApiOperation, MultiblockReport, NamedCredential, OneCommerceUsage, 
PackageInstall, PlatformEncryption, QueuedExecution, Report, ReportExport, RestApi, Sandbox, Search, 
SearchClick, Sites, TimeBasedWorkflow, TransactionSecurity, URI, VisualforceRequest, WaveChange, 
WaveDownload, WaveInteraction, WavePerformance SELECT * limit 500
